statements: SELECT * FROM financial_data;
SELECT id, earnings_report FROM financial_data;
SELECT balance_sheet FROM financial_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, balance_sheet, earnings_report FROM financial_data WHERE id = 2;
SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE id > 2;
SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT balance_sheet FROM financial_data WHERE id = 2;
SELECT earnings_report, balance_sheet FROM financial_data WHERE id > 3;
SELECT id, earnings_report FROM financial_data WHERE balance_sheet LIKE '%assets%';
SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE id BETWEEN 2 AND 4;
SELECT report_id, report_date, revenue, expenses FROM earnings_reports;
SELECT company_id, net_income, expenses FROM earnings_reports;
SELECT report_date, revenue, net_income FROM earnings_reports;
SELECT * FROM balance_sheets ORDER BY sheet_date DESC;
SELECT company_id, assets, equity FROM balance_sheets WHERE liabilities > 0;
SELECT * FROM earnings_reports;
SELECT report_id, company_id, revenue FROM earnings_reports WHERE net_income > 5000 AND expenses < 3000;
SELECT * FROM balance_sheets ORDER BY sheet_date DESC;
SELECT company_id, SUM(assets) AS total_assets FROM balance_sheets GROUP BY company_id;
SELECT report_date, revenue - expenses AS profit FROM earnings_reports WHERE report_date = '2022-07-31';
SELECT * FROM earnings_reports;
SELECT id, report_title, earnings FROM earnings_reports WHERE earnings > 1000 ORDER BY earnings DESC;
SELECT report_title, report_date FROM earnings_reports WHERE report_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY report_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT company_name, total_assets, total_liabilities, total_equity FROM balance_sheets WHERE total_assets > 50000 AND total_liabilities < total_assets;
SELECT analysis_title, analysis_date, revenue - expenses AS net_income FROM financial_analysis WHERE revenue > expenses ORDER BY net_income DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM earnings_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC, earnings ASC;
SELECT report_title, earnings FROM earnings_reports WHERE earnings > 10000;
SELECT company_name, total_assets, total_equity FROM balance_sheets WHERE total_assets > total_liabilities;
SELECT analysis_title, revenue - expenses AS net_profit FROM financial_analysis ORDER BY net_profit DESC;
SELECT report_title, report_date, earnings FROM earnings_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM earnings_reports;
SELECT id, company_name, revenue FROM earnings_reports WHERE revenue > 10000;
SELECT company_name, report_date, net_income FROM earnings_reports ORDER BY net_income DESC;
SELECT * FROM balance_sheets WHERE total_assets < total_liabilities;
SELECT company_name, analysis_date, financial_ratio FROM financial_analysis;
SELECT * FROM earnings_reports WHERE revenue > 100000 ORDER BY report_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT company_name, SUM(net_income) AS total_net_income FROM earnings_reports GROUP BY company_name HAVING SUM(net_income) > 500000 ORDER BY total_net_income DESC;

SELECT fr.company_name, fr.analysis_date, fa.financial_ratio FROM financial_reports fr INNER JOIN financial_analysis fa ON fr.company_name = fa.company_name WHERE fr.type = 'quarterly' ORDER BY fr.report_date ASC;

SELECT bs.company_name, bs.total_assets, bs.total_liabilities, bs.total_equity, fr.type FROM balance_sheets bs LEFT JOIN financial_reports fr ON bs.company_name = fr.company_name ORDER BY bs.balance_date DESC, fr.report_date DESC;

SELECT er.company_name, fr.type, fr.financial_data->>'revenue' AS revenue, fr.financial_data->>'expenses' AS expenses FROM earnings_reports er INNER JOIN financial_reports fr ON er.id = fr.report_id WHERE fr.financial_data->>'profit_margin' > '0.5' ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT * FROM earnings_reports;
SELECT company_name, earnings FROM earnings_reports ORDER BY earnings DESC;
SELECT report_date, company_name FROM balance_sheets WHERE assets > liabilities;
SELECT report_type, report_content FROM financial_reports WHERE report_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT data_type, data_location FROM data_sources WHERE source_name LIKE 'Company%' ORDER BY data_type ASC;
SELECT company_name, earnings FROM earnings_reports WHERE earnings > 10000 ORDER BY company_name DESC, earnings ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT company_name, report_date, ratio1 FROM financial_analysis WHERE ratio1 < 0.5 AND ratio2 > 1 ORDER BY ratio1 DESC, report_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM financial_reports WHERE report_type = 'Quarterly' AND LENGTH(report_content) > 1000 ORDER BY report_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT company_name, data_format FROM data_sources WHERE data_type = 'Excel' ORDER BY data_format ASC, company_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM balance_sheets WHERE assets - liabilities > equity ORDER BY report_date ASC LIMIT 5;
